title: klien_br
author: klien_br
content: Hi fellows,My requirements are building a dApp for network marketing.It would be an easy task consuming 3-4 days.My budget : $250 (Willing to escrow or pay first depending on the party's reputation.Telegram : @M3RC303S

comments.author: TimtheYoutuber
comments.body: My crypto consulting company Forrest Visions can handle this for you. https://forrestvisions.com/defi.html

comments.author: klien_br
comments.body: Quote from: TimtheYoutuber on September 24, 2022, 11:06:43 AMMy crypto consulting company Forrest Visions can handle this for you. https://forrestvisions.com/defi.html Sure you can and I would love to but your company is quite expensive for me atm.If you are ready to go with my budget, we have a deal.

comments.author: bets21
comments.body: Your price is crazy as fuck. Who will develop dapp for $250?
